{"tiddlers":{"$:/language/Buttons/CloseAll/Caption":{"text":"Close All","title":"$:/language/Buttons/CloseAll/Caption","tags":""},"$:/language/Buttons/CloseAll/Hint":{"text":"Close all by tag","title":"$:/language/Buttons/CloseAll/Hint","tags":""},"$:/language/Buttons/OpenAll/Caption":{"text":"Open All","title":"$:/language/Buttons/OpenAll/Caption"},"$:/language/Buttons/OpenAll/Hint":{"text":"Open all by tag","title":"$:/language/Buttons/OpenAll/Hint"},"$:/pluginlibrary/ajh/released":{"text":"The plugin library for the latest and greatest plugins from [ext[t5a|https://github.com/t5a/t5a.github.io.git]]; most recent released versions of plugins by [ext[Andrew|http://t5a.github.io/#Andrew%20Harrison]].","url":"https://t5a.github.io/plugins","title":"$:/pluginlibrary/ajh/released","tags":"$:/tags/PluginLibrary","caption":"Tiddlywiki Library for Plugins by Andrew Harrison"},"$:/plugins/ajh/closeall/template":{"text":"\define lingo-base() $:/language/Buttons/
<$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/CloseAll/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/CloseAll/Caption}} class='tc-image-closeall tc-btn-invisible'><$list filter='[tag{!!title}]'><$action-sendmessage $message='tm-close-tiddler' $param=<<currentTiddler>>/></$list><$list filter='[<tv-config-toolbar-icons>prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/core/images/close-all-button}}</$list><$list filter='[<tv-config-toolbar-text>prefix[yes]]'><<lingo CloseAll/Caption>></$list></$button>","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/closeall/template","tags":"$:/tags/TagDropdown"},"$:/plugins/ajh/openall/icon":{"text":"\define a()<svg class='tc-image-openall tc-image-button' width='22pt' height='22pt' viewBox='0 0 192 192'><path fill='#30f' stroke='#f00' stroke-width='7.5' d='m13.5,52.2l82.5,-48l82.5,48v87.3l-82.5,48l-82.5,-48v-87.3z'/><path fill='#fff' stroke='#30f' stroke-width='5' d='m96,14$(p)$'/></svg>
<$vars p={{$:/plugins/ajh/openall/image!!path}}><<a>></$vars>","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/openall/icon","tags":"$:/tags/Image"},"$:/plugins/ajh/openall/image":{"text":"\define a()<svg class='tc-image-openall tc-image-button' width='22pt' height='22pt' viewBox='0 0 128 128'><path d='m64,3$(p)$'/></svg>
<$vars p={{!!path}}><<a>></$vars>","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/openall/image","tags":"$:/tags/Image","path":"l64,73h-128l64,-73zm-64,104h128v24h-128v-24z"},"$:/plugins/ajh/openall/license":{"text":"This is free and unencumbered software released into the public domain.

Anyone is free to copy, modify, publish, use, compile, sell, or distribute this software, either in source code form or as a compiled binary, for any purpose, commercial or non-commercial, and by any means.

In jurisdictions that recognize copyright laws, the author or authors of this software dedicate any and all copyright interest in the software to the public domain. We make this dedication for the benefit of the public at large and to the detriment of our heirs and successors. We intend this dedication to be an overt act of relinquishment in perpetuity of all present and future rights to this software under copyright law.

THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE.

For more information, please refer to <https://unlicense.org>","url":"https://github.com/t5a/t5a.github.io/blob/master/LICENSE","type":"","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/openall/license","tags":"$:/tags/License","license-type":"Unlicense"},"$:/plugins/ajh/openall/readme":{"text":"This plugin adds the <svg height='22pt' width='22pt' viewBox='0 0 128 128'><path d='m64,3l64,73h-128l64,-73zm-64,104h128v24h-128v-24z'/></svg> ''openall'' button and the {{$:/core/images/close-all-button}} ''closeall'' button to the tag manager drop down menu using the <<tag $:/tags/TagDropdown>>system tag. The open all button opens all non system tiddlers tagged with that drop down tag. The close all button closes all non system tiddlers tagged with that drop down tag. 

This plugin comprises:

* Icon
* Template
* Stylesheet
* Caption and hint","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/openall/readme"},"$:/plugins/ajh/openall/stylesheet":{"text":"html .tc-drop-down button svg, html .tc-drop-down a svg {fill:{{!!button-color}};}html .tc-drop-down button.tc-btn-invisible:hover svg {fill:{{!!button-hover-color}};}html .tc-sidebar-lists .tc-drop-down button svg, html .tc-drop-down a svg {fill:{{!!sidebar-button-color}};}html .tc-sidebar-lists .tc-drop-down button.tc-btn-invisible:hover svg {fill:{{!!sidebar-button-hover-color}};}","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/openall/stylesheet","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","sidebar-button-hover-color":"#04b","sidebar-button-color":"#9cf","caption":"Open All Button","button-hover-color":"#fff","button-color":"#06f"},"$:/plugins/ajh/openall/template":{"text":"\define lingo-base()$:/language/Buttons/
<$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/OpenAll/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/OpenAll/Caption}} class='tc-btn-invisible openall'><$list filter='[tag{!!title}]'><$action-navigate $to=<<currentTiddler>>/></$list><$list filter='[<tv-config-toolbar-icons>prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/plugins/ajh/openall/image}}</$list><$list filter='[<tv-config-toolbar-text>prefix[yes]]'><<lingo OpenAll/Caption>></$list></$button>","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/openall/template","tags":"$:/tags/TagDropdown"}}}
title: $:/plugins/ajh/openall
